caption: On this snowy plain, two men dressed in black coats are walking. They notice something in the distance and hurry towards it. Upon arriving, they find a man giving a bottle of green substance to a dwarf. The man appears to boast about the potency of this substance, leaving the dwarf looking terrified. He commands the man to take him to the warehouse, where he discovers a vast quantity of the same substance. He expresses shock and immediately instructs the man to dispose of it. It seems like he wants the substance destroyed.In another location, a small dragon is on a balcony, and two women are playing with it, entertaining the creature. One of the women then dresses up and heads to a gathering, where she socializes and interacts with various people.
